replies.body:
Oh look, it's the Garen skin you can get for FREE by following them on Twitter!

Scumbag Rito.

Lmfao, I wonder how many people are actually gonna buy it.  
Rito should take free skins out of  skin sale rotation
they won't make money then{{champion:432}}
I dreaded that this would happen...
i see what you did there!
{{champion:64}} But he didn't.
Didn't he? {{champion:161}}
The usual. Just like people getting mystery gifted "Riot" Tristana... the pink recolour that's free for liking Rito's page on Facebook.

{{champion:119}} Hello Ladies and Gentlemen who are not me, Draven. And welcome to today epic rap battle. Our two challengers are ready to sling rhymes and insults at each other so lets us begin the battle. BEGIN!!!!!


{{champion:432}} .....

{{champion:37}} .....

{{champion:432}} ......

{{champion:37}} .....

{{champion:37}} .....

{{champion:119}} Oh man I haven't seen a rap battle this amazing since that one time I made that person sing before I killed him. 

{{champion:432}} .....

{{champion:37}} ......

{{champion:432}} .....

{{champion:37}} .....

{{champion:119}} Looks like this is getting personal now.  

{{champion:432}} .....

{{champion:37}} .....

{{champion:432}} .....

{{champion:37}} ......

{{champion:119}} And time. This rap battle is over. The winner is....I don't know. I haven't had this much trouble deciding on something since I was deciding how to kill that person who ate my pudding. Who do you think won?
I know this is a battle of rapping and insults, but I think Sona went overboard.
I sorta thought Bard won when he was all like "...", but then Sona came back with "..." and Bard just fell off so I believe the winner is {{champion:37}}
I know. When "..." was said my jaw dropped.

WHO WON?
WHO'S NEXT?
YOU DECIDE!!!!!!!!

EPIC
RRRAAAPPP
BBAATTTTLLEESS
OF
LLLLLLLLLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL!!!!!!!!!
BEGIN!!!
{{champion:238}} VS {{champion:98}}
{{champion:64}}  Who was the rap battle between again?

{{champion:37}} 
Only you can hear me Summoner
So I'll make this quick
That old storytelling bloke
Needs his instrument fixed

Always roaming around
Clanging chimes like a kid
He's tooting his own horn
Still no one thinks that it's big

ADC is 1v2
And that Support's leavin' bot
Bard's not the Jungler
Why's he headed up top?

Oh sorry, I offend
Let me change up my tune
Cresendo leavin' them stunned?
Then watch my Power Cord boom!
And the ADC that he left
Me and him aren't quite through
Song of Celerity's giving rest
When my Carry kills him too!
DRAVEN
No not DRAVEN, DRAAAAAAVEEEEEENNN.
That moment when me and lightdragoon both do a story revolving around Sona and Bard not talking.
{{champion:37}} won.

I believe, the real winner here.... Is us, the readers. Oh, and Sona. Definitely Sona. She really gave it to Bard with that zinger, uh, how did it go? Oh, right, ".....". I wanted to applaud right then and there....
SONA SONA SONA{{champion:37}}
copying my comment from thursday...

lol sorry xD 
here have a poro{{summoner:31}}
And give the poro some snax{{item:2054}} or {{item:2052}} one is diet and the other is normal so you need to decide.
haha. dragoon isnt top comment this time.
Oh no...whatever shall I do? D:
Dude, Sona is the clear winner! That "...." stomped Bard senseless.
dude these are awesome and so funny! Keep up the awesome work lightdragoon88!
Oh look the free Garen skin is on sale!
Dreadknight Garen is free for following on twitter??
Yes he is.

Reasons why you should not kick fallen ice cubes under the fridge:

-They are forming an alliance under the fridge to take back the freezer from the new ice cubes. Soon you will have an all out war going on in your freezer.

-There is a monster living under there that is feeding on the ice cubes, slowly. One day he will grow strong enough to consume you.

-They're just trying to cool your drink down for you. Don't be mean to them.
Anyone else think it is odd the amount of attention Riot has been giving Urgot?
The question is: Crabgot Or Lucian....
you know the answer{{champion:6}}
Well, this isn't the first time a black man has been on sale

{{champion:32}} Will I ever go on sale daddy?
{{champion:26}} Only time will tell, my son.
Next thing you know Riot girl tristana and unchained alistar will come back on the market.

putting a free skin on sale...
scumbag move tbh
WOW... i want {{champion:236}} so much.. i have 348 rp, but lucian is 487.....
play more games, get IP, buy lucian. Who's the hell going to buy champs with RP. it's not that hard to get 6300ip {{summoner:13}}
Some people have school. Others have work. Others still have both. It takes a solid week of play to get 6300 IP if you have the time.
Runes are more important ip wise than champs that's why I wait for free rotation and buy with RP
I just bought the Garen skin yesterday!
Why the heck did you buy that skin? Its free for following them on twitter. And it is also a bad skin.
Rito you have doomed use us all by putting akali on sale {{champion:84}}
